data.name: Myriad Colors Phantom World: The Strange Tale of the Bakumatsu Phantom
data.short_description: The team gets recruited to perform in a play about a Phantom in medieval Japan. As they're rehearsing, Koito notices the presence of a real Phantom nearby.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
